strings.Value: "Yes… you anticipated my test. Of course. Well done."
"Not yet. Stay here while I figure out the next... more confining... challenge."
[Attack] "I'm tire of your antics, creature. I'll silence you now."

{n}From out of nowhere, Nok-Nok is standing before you, trying to whistle, but it comes out more of a warbling of the tongue. When he sees you, his eyes gleam in delight.{/n} "You start Nok-Nok's {d|Nok Prison}training{/d} early! Very clever, longshanks keep Nok-Nok almost thinking they try to chain him up like all goblin children."

"But Nok-Nok knows better, be slipping out of cage when little countless times!" {n}He holds up a long link of chain, then dumps it on the ground where it lies like a black iron snake.{/n} "Training done!" {n}He pauses.{/n} "Am I Hero now?"
{n}From out of nowhere, Nok-Nok is standing before you, looking slightly confused. When he sees you, he grins, his eyes gleaming in delight.{/n}

"You start Nok-Nok's {d|Nok Executed}training{/d} early! Very clever, Nok-Nok almost thinking longshanks try to kill him. But Nok-Nok know better!" {n}He raps his head twice, winces, then his slow smile returns.{/n}

{n}Nok-Nok pulls down the collar of his ragged vest, revealing huge bruises on his neck – and then removes his cap, showing his head, which looks to have a few more lumps than before.{/n} "Neck tough."

"Also, when guard not looking, loosen axe head – axe fall off, guard hit me in head with handle, but Nok-Nok head too tough for that... guard so surprised, Nok-Nok bite him in leg, then grab teeth with keys..." {n}He pauses, thinking, rubbing his head.{/n} "No... keys. With teeth."
{n}He smiles again.{/n} "Guard chase, hit Nok-Nok a few times in head, but can't follow in sewer. Now Nok-Nok free again. Am I Hero now?"
"I Hero now! Hero better than... all other heroes!" {n}He doesn't seem to hear you.{/n}
